Class Interest_Group_Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • socialnow.rest.Interest_Group_Controller

  • @RestController
public class Interest_Group_Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Erdem on 12/4/2015. Interest group related requests are here

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Interest_Group addGroup(java.lang.String addGroupForm)
      Creates an interest group object and puts it into database, request sends the parameters
      Interest_Group addMember(java.lang.String addMemberForm)
      adds a user to a group, updates both group and user
      Interest_Group addPost(java.lang.String addPostForm)
      adds a created post to a group, updates group posts
      java.util.List<Interest_Group> getAllGroups(java.lang.String formIn)
      Returns all groups user is allowed to see
      java.util.List<Interest_Group> listAllGroups(java.lang.String userTokenForm)
      lists all groups that user is allowed to see
      java.util.List<Interest_Group> ListMyGroups(java.lang.String addPostForm)
      all groups user created us returned
      java.util.List<Interest_Group> ListParticipatedGroups(java.lang.String addPostForm)
      all groups that the user is a member of
      Interest_Group removeMember(java.lang.String addMemberForm)
      removes a user from a group, updates both group and user
      Interest_Group_Detail showGroupDetail(java.lang.String addMemberForm)
      returns the extended version of Interest_Group, opens up all other sub objects and gives their details as well
